hero.intro: Authentic Vietnamese and Swedish food for your events
hero.bullet1: 10+ years of experience in the restaurant industry
hero.bullet2: Professionally organized and carefully executed at every event

services.heading: Our services
services.subheading: We offer catering tailored to your needs. Choose below for more information and images.
services.heroIntro: Let us take care of the food for your party or corporate event – so you can focus on your guests.
services.cateringDeliveryDesc: We deliver ready-made dishes to your address. Perfect for smaller meetings and home parties.

varaTjanster.leveransTillval1: Free delivery within 8 km from the restaurant (drop-off at entrance)
varaTjanster.leveransTillval2: Chef on site: SEK 2,500 (Sets up, manages the buffet & makes sushi for up to 2 hours. Booking at least 1 week in advance.)
varaTjanster.villkor4: Pre-order by 2:00 PM the day before
varaTjanster.villkor5: Standard, premium and premium vegan/vegetarian can be combined

menus.heading: Menu
menus.intro: Browse our selection below and choose a menu to see the full content. Each option can be adapted to your event.
menus.selectMenu: Select a menu in the header to see its content here.

contact.heading: Contact
contact.intro: We're happy to help with catering for parties, meetings or events. Send a request below.
contact.hoursNote: We usually respond within 24 hours on weekdays.
contact.formIntro: Fill in the form and we'll get back to you with a proposal.
contact.loginToSubmit: Fill in the form and click Request quote.
contact.successMessage: We have received your request and will get back to you as soon as possible.
contact.checkEmail: Please check your email – you will receive a confirmation with your order number. We often respond within 24 hours.
contact.name: Name
contact.messagePlaceholder: Please tell us about the event, menu preferences, allergies, etc.
contact.errorLogin: Fill in all required fields and try again.
contact.errorSave: Could not save your order. Please try again.
contact.errorSend: Could not send. Please try again or call us.

goals.heading: Goals & Our mission
goals.p1: Our goal is to create reliable and personal catering with a focus on quality, taste and service.
goals.p2: Behind Catering Tanne is a genuine passion for cooking and many years of experience working in various restaurants, where we have had the privilege of serving thousands of satisfied guests.
goals.p3: Our journey began with a love of food and meeting people. Over the years we have learned how important it is that every meal not only tastes good, but also feels right for the occasion – whether it's a private party, a corporate event or a smaller gathering.
goals.goal1: deliver high-quality food, prepared with care
goals.goal2: offer flexible catering adapted to customer wishes
goals.goal3: create a safe and smooth experience from first contact to delivery
goals.p4: For us, catering is not just about food, but about trust, commitment and pride in the craft. Our goal is for every customer to feel well taken care of and confident that the food is in professional hands.
goals.imageAlt: Kitchen with spices, oil and flowers – quality and care in cooking

testimonials.heading: Testimonials
testimonials.intro: It means a lot to us what our customers think. Here are some reviews from those who have ordered catering from us.
testimonials.submitIntro: Have you used our catering? We appreciate your feedback. Your review may be published on the site (we will contact you first).
testimonials.reviewPlaceholder: Please tell us about your experience with our catering.
testimonials.thanksMessage: We have received your feedback and will get back to you if we want to publish it.
testimonials.errorSend: Could not send. Please try again later.

dishSlider.heading: Dishes we have served
dishSlider.intro: Some of the dishes we have prepared and served at catering events
dishSlider.imageAlt: Dishes we have served at catering
dishSlider.lightboxAlt: Dishes we have served – larger view

varukorg.heading: Shopping cart
varukorg.intro: Review your order below. When you're ready, click Request quote to send a request.

header.howToOrder: How to order from Catering Tanne
header.helpStep1: Choose dishes from our <menuLink>menu</menuLink> and enter the desired quantity.
header.helpStep2: Click "Add to cart" to add the dishes to your cart.
header.helpStep3: Open the <cartLink>cart</cartLink> and review your selected dishes.
header.helpStep4: Click "Request quote" and fill in the form with contact details, date, number of guests and other information. Then click "Request quote" to submit.
header.helpStep5: Catering Tanne will get back with a proposal. Approve to complete your order.

priceCalculator.title: Price calculator
priceCalculator.subtitle: Quickly calculate the cost for your party here
priceCalculator.disclaimer: * Final price confirmed within 24 hours at most and as soon as possible.
priceCalculator.priceExplanationAria: Read explanation about price variation and approximately
priceCalculator.priceExplanationP1: The final price depends on which dishes you choose, current raw material prices, and any extra accessories.
priceCalculator.priceExplanationP2: If you wish for extra accessories or decoration, such as more soy sauce, wasabi, ginger, different sauces or other extras, the price may be adjusted according to your wishes.
priceCalculator.priceExplanationP3: We offer several options within each menu, which is why prices are shown as a price range to give you a clearer overview.
priceCalculator.priceExplanationP4: "Ca" (approximately) means the price is an estimate. The exact price is confirmed after we have received your order and gone through the details together with you.
priceCalculator.priceExplanationP5: We will get back to you with confirmation within 24 hours and contact you as soon as possible.
